Renovated cedar home offers dual-occupancy potential.
SOLD BY JAMES BROUGHAM. PH: 0412 620 498.
This charming three-bedroom residence oozes character and warmth while delivering fresh appeal with thanks to a modern makeover. From the street, this striking cedar home is complemented by an arresting verandah, leadlight front door and welcoming garden. It looks like a country charmer but a surprise awaits inside.

This sensational property offers more than meets the eye.
